resources.string: "Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at 833-224-6603."
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Please call 833-224-6603 from another phone to activate your 4G LTE service and then try again."
Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars) and try again. If this problem persists, please contact customer service at 833-224-6603 for assistance.
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at 833-224-6603."
To activate your phone, call 833-224-6603 from another phone.
To activate your phone, follow the instructions included with your new phone or contact the Spectrum mobile administrator at your organization.
Your Spectrum mobile phone is now active. Your number is %1$s
"You don't have a Spectrum mobile plan or you've used all of your plan allowance, please contact Spectrum mobile"

"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at (800) 922-0204."
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Please call (800) 922-0204 from another phone to activate your service and then try again."
Make sure you have a good signal (multiple bars) and try again. If this problem persists, please contact customer service at (800) 922-0204 for assistance.
"Sorry, we're having trouble activating your phone. Contact customer service at 1-877-807-4646."
Authorization code does not match. Please try again.
The authorization code we sent you had expired, please enter the new code we sent you now, or try with Account pin.
We cannot generate anymore one time Authorization code for the next 24 hours, please try authenticating with your account pin or contact customer service at 1-877-807-4646.
Account PIN does not match. Please try again.
To activate your phone, call (800) 922-0204 from another phone.
To activate your phone, follow the instructions included with your new phone or contact the Verizon Wireless administrator at your organization.
Please wait while we prepare your phone.
This may take a few minutes

"Before you activate this phone, back up your contacts and turn off your old phone.
Once you start activation, we'll transfer your number to this phone and deactivate your old phone."
Your Verizon phone is now active. Your number is %1$s
To transfer your number to your new phone, your old phone needs to be turned off.
Your data usage is currently limited due to time of day or a data limit. You will need to use Wi-Fi to continue setting up your device.
"You don't have a Verizon Wireless plan or you've used all of your plan allowance, please contact Verizon"
Due to time of day or a data limit
Let Verizon collect information about the apps on your devices. With this info, Verizon can troubleshoot more quickly when you call Verizon for support.
You can change these settings at any time in the My Verizon App.
Help improve your experience with Verizon
Add data or roaming plan through Verizon
To get started, enter the authorization code that was sent to your previous device associated with your phone number:
"To get started, enter your account's PIN:"
